name: AndyForKansasDailyUpdates
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This flash briefing will keep you up to date with one campaign item each day. Andy is indeed a long shot in his run for Governor, as he does not live in Kansas. However under current Kansas law, that is not an obstacle. But the upshot is that Andy is raising money for a charity called Cure SMA. So add this to your flash briefing for a short daily update on what's going on in the campaign and/or a fun fact about Andy, Kansas or both.
